name: Cyber Chess (itch)
description:
This game was made during the 30 hours Facebook Game Jam.

Combining classic elements from the Tower Defense genre and recreating many mechanics from the popular Auto Chess mod, Cyber Chess brings a new experience for single-player game fans. Position your mooks on the battlefield in order to defeat the incoming hordes from the rival gangs, all in a charming 2d aesthetic deeply inspired by the cyberpunk cultural movement.

Team:

  • Fabrício Guedes: Programmer
  • Gabriel Simmel: Programmer
  • Leonardo Pizani: Artist
  • Rafael Clerici: Artist, Designer
